meanings.definition: A polysaccharide found in plant cell walls.
meanings.sent1: The xylan in the plant cell walls provides structural support.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the role of xylan in plant cell walls.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to build a house using xylan from the trees.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the xylan holding the plant upright.
meanings.sent5: The xylan in the cell walls acts like a glue, holding everything together.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of polysaccharides that are composed of xylose units.
meanings.sent1: The bakery used xylan to enhance the texture of their bread.
meanings.sent2: Xylan is commonly used in food products for its binding properties.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled xylan all over the kitchen, creating a sticky mess.
meanings.sent4: The relationship between the ingredients was as complex as the structure of xylan.
meanings.sent5: The xylan added a unique sweetness to the dish, surprising everyone.
